passage_text: Distance from Washington, DC to New York, NY. The total distance from Washington, DC to New York, NY is 204 miles. This is equivalent to 329 kilometers or 178 nautical miles. Your trip begins in Washington, District of Columbia. It ends in New York, New York.

The air travel (bird fly) shortest distance from New York to Washington is 328.48 km= 204.11 miles. If you travel with an airplane (which has average speed of 560 miles) between New York to Washington, It takes 0.36 hours to arrive. Also check out United States distances.
